entities.name: neptune
entities.description: Two Neptunes appear in the sky, indicating a midget in glasses is being born.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry has two Neptunes on his parchment.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron imitates Professor Trelawney's mystical whisper and talks to Harry.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a teacher who interprets celestial signs.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus and Dean snigger at Ron's imitation.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is working nearby with Seamus.

entities.name: laven-der brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is excited about finding an unaspected planet.

entities.name: uranus
entities.description: Professor Trelawney identifies Uranus as the unaspected planet.
